summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1364, for the improvement of Harvard Avenue North, from East Lynn Street to Roanoke Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading, curbing, guttering and sidewalking the same, under Ordinance No. 15049 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
